metadata.name: Suspicious Process Execution From Fake Recycle.Bin Folder
metadata.comment: Detects process execution from a fake recycle bin folder, often used to avoid security solution.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower('recyclers.bin\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('recycler.bin\\'))))

output.summary: Detects process execution from a fake recycle bin folder, often used to avoid security solution.
